## âœ… Checklist

<!-- Ensure all requirements are met before requesting review -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code is properly commented
- [ ] Lint checks pass (`black`, `isort`, `flake8`)
- [ ] Type hints added where applicable

### Testing
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Edge cases considered and tested
- [ ] Test coverage maintained or improved

### Documentation
- [ ] Docstrings updated for new/changed functions
- [ ] README updated if needed
- [ ] Examples work correctly
- [ ] Breaking changes documented

### Integration
- [ ] Changes work with Docker deployment
- [ ] CLI tools still function correctly
- [ ] API compatibility maintained
- [ ] Success metrics validation passes

### Security
- [ ] No secrets or sensitive data in code
- [ ] Security best practices followed
- [ ] Dependencies are secure and up-to-date
